dict.string: To record a bird sighting the app uses your device's GPS to determine your current location. It will use these coordinates to lookup the name of the location in the internet (using Apple's reverse geocoding service) and find a name for your current location if you give permission to use your location. If you don't give permission to use GPS you won't be able to help GPS show your location but can still record observations.

If you don't give permission to use GPS you won't be able to help GPS show your location but can still record observations.
